document_name: Page de garde prodoc millenium village.pdf

outputs.output_descr: This program intends to improve the living conditions of the targer population in 2 clusters of Cameroon by offering them a range of supports designed to contribute to the achievement of the Millenium Development Goals (MDGs). The Program will contribute to the implementation of the growth and employment strategy paper (GESP) of the Gvt by piloting application at the cluster level and with the MDGs serving as the reference point.

project_descr: The program will contribute to the implementation of the growth and employment strategy paper of the Gvt by piloting application at the cluster level and with the MDGs serving as the reference point.
